About.first-paragraph: My first experiences with programming occurred in 2016, during high school. Since then, I have been delving deeper into this fascinating field. In 2021, I took my initial steps as a developer, primarily focusing on the frontend. By the end of that same year, I decided to venture into the backend realm, evolving into a full-stack engineer with a concentration in backend development.
About.second-paragraph: When it comes to problem-solving, I am an enthusiast for the latest technologies and employ techniques that enhance code quality, such as automated testing, Hexagonal Architecture, and meticulous code reviews. Additionally, the implementation of CI/CD is integral to my approach, making the maintenance of proposed solutions more efficient.
About.third-paragraph: Beyond the realm of programming, swimming is one of my hobbies, aiding me in recharging my energies. I also dedicate part of my free time to studying topics related to IT, ensuring I stay continually updated. Ultimately, nothing holds more value to me than cherishing precious moments with my family.
